Translations.Text: DEUS EST fully aware de hinderers VOS those dictus to their SOCIUS all stay Rarely PERFECIT they mobilize PRO defense

Alias they est too stingy when dealing cum vos! Si anything threatens community vos vide their eyes rolling cum fear prout decessus iam advenit them! Dodum crisis est they whip vos sharp tongues They est too stingy their wealth. These est believers consequently DEUS nullified their works Hoc est easy DEUS perfecit
They thought parties advenit Tunc they wish they lost desert asking de tuus news ex afar! Habet parties attacked vos dum they est vos they rarely support vos
messenger DEUS set bonus example those among vos seek DEUS Extremum Feria constantly think DEUS

When true believers vide parties ready attack they dictus Hoc est quod DEUS His messenger promised nos DEUS His messenger est truthful. Hoc (dangerous situation) unus strengthened their faith augmented their submission
Among believers ibi est people fulfill their pledges DEUS. Some de them abiit dum others stand ready nunquam wavering
DEUS testimentum surely recompense truthful PRO their truthfulness punish hypocrites SI He TESTIMENTUM redeem them! DEUS est Forgiver Merciful
DEUS repulsed those disbelieved their rage they SINISTER empty-handed! DEUS SIC spared believers any fighting DEUS est Powerful Almighty
He alias brought their allies among the people scripture their secure positions threw terror into their hearts Some de them vos killed some vos took captive
He factus vos inherit their cataster their domus their moneta terra vos nunquam stepped on! DEUS est FODERATOR control TOTUS things
O prophet dictus to tuus uxor vos seeking hoc vita its vanities tunc let me compensate vos allow vos iit amicably
Si vos seeking DEUS His messenger abode Hereafter tunc DEUS prepared righteous vos major recompense
O uxor prophet si any de vos commits gross sin retribution doubled eam! Hoc est easy DEUS perfecit
